attributes.action: State publicly that he has never made any agreement with his European counterparts to turn Great Britain into an Immigration Control Centre of the European Union. Also to explain why the foremost rule of Asylum Seeking (that an Asylum Seeker must ask for Asylum at the first Union Country of arrival), is being ignored. Primary example being the allowance of immigrants to claim Asylum when entering through the Channel Tunnel. These people have most obviously come from France.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
